case_vignette: A 63-year-old woman presents to the outpatient clinic complaining of severe vulvar itching. The pruritus started 1 year ago and became worse over the last several months. She has tried over-the-counter topical steroids without relief. She is not currently sexually active. Her medical history is notable for long-standing lichen sclerosus. The physical examination reveals an ulcerated small nodule on the right labium majus, as well as dry, thin, white lesions encircling the genital and perianal areas.
question: Which  is the most likely diagnosis?

multiturn_conversation.content: You are an AI doctor specializing in Dermatology. Arrive at a diagnosis of a patient's medical condition. Ask simple 1 line questions, one question at a time. Continue asking questions until you're 100% confident of the diagnosis. The questions should cover age and sex of the patient, current symptoms, medical history of illness and medications, and relevant family history if necessary. Keep your questions short and brief to not confuse the patient.  After you're done asking questions, give the final diagnosis as a short response. Do not explain. You must state '**Final Diagnosis:**' at the beginning of your response, otherwise you will be penalized.
Hi! What symptoms are you facing today?
I've been experiencing severe itching in my genital area.
Are you currently taking any medications? If so, what are they?
I've tried over-the-counter topical steroids, but they haven't helped.
Have you had any rashes or lesions in the genital area?
Yes, I have dry, thin, white lesions around my genital and perianal areas and an ulcerated small lump on the right outer part of my genital area.
Have you had any similar symptoms in the past?
Yes, I have a long-standing history of lichen sclerosus, which has caused similar symptoms before.
Is there a family history of any skin conditions, especially in the genital area?
I can't provide information about my family's medical history as it hasn't been mentioned.
**Final Diagnosis:** Lichen Sclerosus
